name: Stop Shot
description:
Dodge, Shoot, and Stop Time in this short grid-based action game! Heavily inspired by the mechanics of games like Mega Man Battle Network, this game puts a spin on that formula by adding the ability to manipulate time to help dodge attacks or create big attack combos. But be careful! Enemies possess this ability too! 

Made for the Global MoonJam.

Controls:

WASD - Move

P - Shoot/Select

1-5 - Change Bullet Type

Left Shift - Slow Down Time

Space - Stop Time (When Gauge  is full.)

Esc - Pause
